definition: not yet/did not/have not/not/8th earthly branch: 1-3 p.m., 6th solar month (7th July-6th August), year of the Sheep/ancient Chinese compass point: 210°
once/already/ever (in the past)/former/previously/(past tense marker used before verb or clause)

sentences.english: A small bird will drop frozen dead from a bough without ever having felt sorry for itself.
sentences.chinese: 一只小鸟将自枝头冻毙跌下来他未曾为自己感到可怜。

sentences.english: So-called choices are just illusions which have never existed.
sentences.chinese: 所谓的选择只是个未曾存在的虚像。

sentences.english: It dawned on me that I'd left the oven on.
sentences.chinese: 我突然想起烘箱未曾关掉。

sentences.english: These are they who have not been defiled with women, for they are virgins.
sentences.chinese: 这些人未曾与妇女在一起受到玷污，他们原是童身。

sentences.english: Hardly a whisper of concern has been voiced.
sentences.chinese: 几乎一点点关心也未曾表示过。

sentences.english: But that thou none lovest is most evident;
sentences.chinese: 可是显然地，你对谁都未曾动心。

sentences.english: Deap sea is a landscape man has never been explored.
sentences.chinese: 深海是人类未曾探索过的地球景观。

sentences.english: I had never seen a grown man break down and cry.
sentences.chinese: 我从未曾看到过一个这么强壮的汉子痛哭失声。

sentences.english: Or “Cartier: You’ll be sorry you didn’t.”
sentences.chinese: 或“卡地亚，遗憾未曾拥有”。

sentences.english: Yet you have a few people in Sardis who have not soiled their clothes.
sentences.chinese: 然而在撒狄你还有几名是未曾污秽自己衣服的。

sentences.english: The computer never asked students to retype them.
sentences.chinese: 电脑之前未曾请学生们重新输入它们。

sentences.english: TIGELLINUS: Sire I heard nothing concerning the matter.
Gradually, it seemed like we'd never been thereat all.
sentences.chinese: 但慢慢地，我们就好像从未曾去过德国一样了。

sentences.english: Nor art nor nature ever created a lovelier thing than you.
sentences.chinese: 艺术及自然未曾创造出比你更美丽动人的东西。

sentences.english: There, at Vyborg, we also had an unpleasant incident.
sentences.chinese: 当然我们在维堡也遭遇了一次未曾预料到的事故。

sentences.english: The lion's whelps have not trodden it, nor the fierce lion passed by it.
sentences.chinese: 狂傲的野兽未曾行过，猛烈的狮子也未曾经过。

definition: did I ever ...? (or "did he ever ...?" etc)
always/at all times/never (if used in negative sentence)
to not have had time/to have not yet/not to touch upon
many times/on more than one occasion
